Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>My friend is sending up a smoke signal.
I can't wait to catch up!
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>It sounds like things aren't all right in
Korok Forest. Maybe they will be soon!
Talk30: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm so tired though. I can't move...
Talk11: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>Aww,<sp:5:0:0> my friend and I got separated...
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You're moving me? Then you must be
able to see me! Be gentle, OK?

I'm in a real pickle. I was traveling with
someone and got separated.
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> You can see me?<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm a Korok!<sp:5:1:0> One of the children of
the forest!

I was traveling with my friend...
Near01: I need to reach my friend!
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for bringing my friend! Here's
something for you!
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>I'm worried about everyone in
Korok Forest.
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM_00>Reunited at last! Thanks!<sp:5:0:0>


I'd like to give you something, but here's
all I have!
